instructionsModal.title: $t(instructions)
instructionsModal.instructions: Tap <0>anywhere</0> in the screen to change the arrow's direction.

wakeLockModal.title: $t(wakeLock)
wakeLockModal.feature: The Wake Lock feature prevents the device from <0>dimming</0> and <0>locking</0> the screen while using the application.
wakeLockModal.phone: You can determine whether your phone supports this feature or not by looking at the top of the screen.
wakeLockModal.support: If your phone doesn't support the wake lock feature, soon you will be able to report the issue.
